text: Silas Silvius Njiru (10 October 1928 â€“ 28 April 2020) was a Kenyan Roman Catholic bishop. He was born in Kevote, Kenya. Njiru was ordained to the priesthood in 1955. He served as titular bishop of Maturba and auxiliary bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Meru, Kenya, in 1975 and 1976. Njiru then served as bishop of the Meru Diocese from 1976 to 2004.Diocese of Meru Njiru died on 28 April 2020 from COVID-19 in Rivoli, Piedmont, Italy at the age of 91. == References == Category:1928 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Kenyan people Category:Roman Catholic bishops Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Italy
